name: Braincell
description:
If you've ever met a cat, you know that they have, at best, a single braincell which they share with every other cat in the area.

This game puts you in charge of that one braincell.

Good luck!

This game is currently in early development, so expect major changes and improvements going forward! Feedback is greatly appreciated!

Keyboard & Mouse Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left/Right Shift to dash
  • Left click to pass the braincell

Gamepad Controls:

  • Left joystick to move
  • L2 to dash
  • L1/R1 to pass the braincell
